subject: Christian-Religious-Education
generalLearningOutcomes: Develop foundational knowledge and skills in Christian Religious Education
Apply Christian Religious Education concepts to solve real-world problems
Demonstrate critical thinking and analytical skills in Christian Religious Education
Communicate effectively using Christian Religious Education terminology and concepts

subStrands.name: Introduction to Concepts
specificLearningOutcomes: Understand basic Christian Religious Education principles and concepts
Identify key terminology and vocabulary in Christian Religious Education
Apply fundamental skills and knowledge in Christian Religious Education
keyInquiryQuestions: What is Christian Religious Education and why is it important?
How do we use Christian Religious Education in everyday life?
What are the fundamental principles of Christian Religious Education?
